Package android.smartcard

Proprietary interface that provides access to secure elements available in the device.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ICardChannel Abstraction of a basic or logical card channel, managed by a SmartcardClient instance, connected to the smartcard service.
SmartcardClient.ISmartcardConnectionListener Interface definition of smartcard listener to be informed about smartcard service connect and disconnect events.
 

Class Summary
SmartcardClient Adapter class to be used by clients of the smartcard service.
SmartcardError Smartcard service parameter class used to marshal exception information from the smartcard service to clients.
 

Package android.smartcard Description

Proprietary interface that provides access to secure elements available in the device. This interface consists of a flat and simple API for the handling and management of secure element ressources for applications. The entry point of the interface is the class SmartcardClient. This class initializes the available secure element resources and offers these for communication. Then the interface package contains additional classes like CardChannel which allow a structured management of communication streams to different secure elements.
